instruction.en:
![](https://course-qa-basics.s3.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/section-1-task-8.png)

Write a command to output the word "Testing" to the console and comment out that line.

Similar solution is:
```python
#print("Hello Python")
```
instruction.ru:
![](https://course-qa-basics.s3.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/section-1-task-8.png)

Напишите команду вывода в консоль слова "Testing" и закомментируйте эту строку.

Похожий пример решения:
```python
#print("Hello Python")
```
